content: {"name": "Father English Community Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "For regitration visit 435 Getty Avenue, Patterson.", "email": "", "url": "https://ccpaterson.org/frenglish", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "35 Getty Avenue", "address_2": "", "city": "Paterson", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07503", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.9040374, "longitude": -74.1646404}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 279-7100", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Needs volunteers"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Emergency food available on an as-needed basis."}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
